text: Bob Jones University (BJU) is a private Protestant Christian university in Greenville, South Carolina.Bob Jones University Fast Facts The university was founded in 1927 by Bob Jones, Sr. (1883-1968), an evangelist. The school has around 3,000 students attending it, and there are 2,755 undergraduate students attending.Bob Jones University College Scorecard Until the 1970s, BJU only allowed white students to attend.
